articles.title: Protesters try to attack driver after truck speeds through anti-Iran demonstration in Los Angeles
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Los Angeles police responded Sunday after somebody drove a U-Haul box truck down a street crowded with marchers demonstrating in support of the Iranian people, causing protesters to scramble out of the way and then run after the speeding vehicle to try to attack the driver. articles.title: Trump’s motorcade in Florida rerouted due to ‘suspicious object’
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump’s motorcade took a different route than usual to the airport as he was departing Florida on Sunday due to a “suspicious object,” according to the White House. The object, which the White House did not describe, was discovered during security sweeps in advance

articles.title: Federal Reserve Chair Powell says DOJ has subpoenaed central bank, threatens criminal indictment
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Sunday the Department of Justice has served the central bank with subpoenas and threatened it with a criminal indictment over his testimony this summer about the Fed’s building renovations. articles.title: Winnipeggers gather in support of protests in Iran
articles.description: On the steps of the Manitoba Legislature this weekend, hundreds of Winnipeggers gathered to voice their concerns about a communications blackout in Iran as protests there continue.
